error.defaultMessage: Error! Something went wrong. Please try again later.

form.PasswordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters.
form.PasswordRequiresDigit: Password must have at least one digit ('0'-'9').
form.PasswordRequiresUpper: Password must have at least one uppercase ('A'-'Z').
form.PasswordRequiresLower: Password must have at least one lowercase ('a'-'z').
form.EmailTaken: This email address is already taken.
form.KvkExists: This Kvk number is already registered.
form.IncorrectPassword: Incorrect password. Please check your password and try again.
form.UserNotFound: No user found with the provided email address.
form.PasswordMismatch: Password and confirmation password do not match.
